p: This study was conducted on a monocentric cohort of patients included in 2 prospective studies, treated either for ruptured (Patients' Follow-up After Subarachnoid Hemorrhage Caused by Ruptured Intracranial Aneurysms - FUSAC -NCT02879175-) or unruptured intracranial aneurysms (Standardized Long-Term Follow-up of Patients After Endovascular Embolization of a Brain Aneurysm - ANENDOVASC -NCT02878967-) with FD. Our institutional ethics committee approved the two studies.
